name: get_history
description: Get Detail on Structure Change Events - Returns details on structure change events - History

parameters.description: Auto-generated parameters struct for `/history` endpoint. Spec: history_properties.yaml

agg_by.description: The field by which data will be aggregated. All values must be entered in UPPERCASE.

agg_limit.description: The limit on how many aggregated results will be displayed

agg_term_fields.description: The field(s) for which aggregations will be counted for each unique term. All values must be entered in UPPERCASE.

fields.description: Comma-delimited list of fields to return (all fields must be UPPERCASE)

file_download.description: Download flag (if set, triggers file download)

filters.description:
Filter expression for advanced querying using FDIC BankFind syntax. 
    
    **Format:** `FIELD:VALUE`, `FIELD:>=VALUE`, `FIELD:<=VALUE`, combined with `AND`/`OR`.
    
    **Examples:**
      - Single value: `CERT:10002`
      - Date range: `FAILDATE:>=20200101 AND FAILDATE:<=20201231`
      - Multiple filters: `STATE:CA AND ACTIVE:1`
    
    **Note:** Incorrect syntax will result in a 400 error from the FDIC API.
    
    For full details, see: https://banks.data.fdic.gov/docs
    
    All Fields must be UPPERCASE.

limit.description: Number of records to return (default: 10, max: 10,000)

search.description:
Flexible text search against institution records
Search supports text search and fuzzy matching, as opposed to filters that are exact matches. All values must be entered in UPPERCASE.
Examples:
* Search by Name
`NAME: Island`
* Search by Name (fuzzy match)
`NAME: Iland`
* Search by State
`STATE: VA`

sort_by.description: Field to sort by (default: `NAME`, all fields must be UPPERCASE)

parameters.title: HistoryParameters

description: Returns MCP server status for Inspector/health validation
